item.title: The World Is Not Enough Review: Flawed But Fun James Bond Entry Captures The Best & Worst Of Pierce Brosnan’s Era
item.description: Pierce Brosnan's third outing as James Bond is a fun-filled espionage adventure featuring complex villains and an enjoyable sense of humor.

item.title: None Of 28 Years Later’s Confirmed Stars Are The Movie's Lead, Actor Seemingly Reveals
item.description: None of 28 Years Later's confirmed stars are the movie's lead, actor Aaron Taylor-Johnson seemingly revealed during a new interview.

item.title: Boogie Nights Ending Explained
item.description: Boogie Nights documents life in the porn industry in the 1970s and 1980s, but did any character manage to escape the cycle of drugs and violence?
